mapper.select: SELECT id,tag_name,create_date FROM web_tag WHERE REPLACE(UPPER(tag_name),' ','') = #{name}

SELECT wt.id,tag_name,create_date FROM web_tag wt LEFT OUTER JOIN web_tag_count wtc ON wt.id = wtc.tag_id
wtc.module = #{module,javaType=TagModule,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler} AND wtc.refrences_count > 0
AND tag_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name},'%')
ORDER BY wtc.refrences_count DESC,wt.id DESC
LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
